title: Create Matplotlib Plot Legends
description: Matplotlib is a Python library that enables users to create various types of graphs and plots. This tutorial will guide you through the process of creating a legend in a Matplotlib plot.

meta.title: Matplotlib Tutorials | Python Data Visualization
meta.description: Learn how to create legends in Matplotlib plots, a powerful Python data visualization library. Explore tips for using Jupyter Notebook and get started with your data visualization journey.
meta.keywords: Matplotlib, Python, Data Visualization, Jupyter Notebook, Plots, Graphs
